parameters.name: CreateTimeEnd
parameters.description: The end time when the specified instance is created. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: CreateTimeStart
parameters.description: The start time when the specified instance is created. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: EndTimeEnd
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. Example: 2016-05-23T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: EndTimeStart
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. Example: 2016-05-23T12:00:00Z.

parameters.name: InstanceIDs
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,). You can specify a maximum of 100 IDs.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description:
The code of the service. You can query the service code by calling the **QueryProductList** operation or viewing **Codes of Alibaba Cloud services**.

>This parameter cannot be left empty if the region is specified.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

parameters.name: RenewStatus
parameters.description:
The renewal status of the specified instance. Valid values:

*   AutoRenewal: The instance is automatically renewed.
*   ManualRenewal: The instance is manually renewed.
*   NotRenewal: The instance is not renewed.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Subscription: subscription
*   PayAsYouGo: pay-as-you-go
